pageTitle: Vulnerability Note VU#441785 - SupportSoft ActiveX controls contain multiple buffer overflows
TableContextTimeStampBeforeTable: {2120=Original Release date: 23 Feb 2007 | Last revised: 13 Apr 2009}
textBeforeTable: Systems Affected (Learn More) Disable ActiveX Disabling ActiveX controls in the Internet Zone (or any zone used by an attacker) appears to prevent exploitation of this and other ActiveX vulnerabilities. Instructions for disabling ActiveX in the Internet Zone can be found in the "Securing Your Web Browser" document.  "Compatibility Flags"=dword:00000400 [HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\Software\Microsoft\Internet
